newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Third party interested in Nam Pei stake.
newsitem.headline: Third party interested in Nam Pei stake.

text.p: Nam Pei Hong (Holding) Ltd said on Monday that Tung Fong Hung (Holdings) Ltd had been approached by an independent third party relating to the acquisition of Tung Fong Hung's entire stake in Nam Pei Hong.
Tung Fong Hung owns 29.09 percent of Nam Pei Hong, the companies said in a joint statement.
"The directors of Nam Pei Hong (Holding) Limited are informed that this approach is preliminary and no binding agreement has been entered into," the companies said.
The companies announced in January that they were looking into amalgamating their medicine businesses.
Trading of Nam Pei Hong shares was suspended last Friday and was due to resume on Monday. The stock last traded at HK$0.49.
